name: Offroad Escalader
description:
Get ready for the drive of your life!You are about to take on the most thrilling drive of your life on this Offroad.Boost up your speed like no one else can! Fasten your seat belts.
It's gonna be a tough ride!
* Fantastic graphics
* Precise physics simulation
* Thrilling gameplay
* Easy controls
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
